products.name: Kjeltec 9 Analyser
products.description: The Kjeltec™ 9 Analyser provides fully automated Kjeldahl analysis, combining distillation, titration, and advanced data handling in one system. Designed for rapid nitrogen and protein determination, it ensures high throughput, minimal handling, and superior accuracy across food, feed, and agricultural laboratories.
features: Complete automation of distillation and titration processes
High-precision nitrogen and protein determination
Built-in digital data logging and LIMS connectivity
Reduced operator exposure to reagents for enhanced safety
Compliant with international standards such as AOAC, ISO, and IDF

products.name: Kjeltec 9 Distillator
products.description: The Kjeltec™ 9 Distillator is an advanced, fully automated distillation unit designed for fast, safe, and precise Kjeldahl analysis. It delivers unmatched reproducibility for nitrogen and protein determination while optimizing reagent usage and sample throughput.
features: Automated distillation with precise control and reproducibility
Fast sample turnaround and minimal operator involvement
Integrated safety features and reagent monitoring
Compatible with Kjeltec 9 Analyser and other FOSS systems
Compliant with international standards for Kjeldahl analysis (AOAC, ISO, IDF)

products.name: Dual Bod Incubator Cum Bacteriological Incubator
Dual Chamber Bod Cum Bacteriological Incubator
Semi‑Automatic Pensky Martens Flash Point Apparatus
Automatic Cleveland Open Cup Flash Point Tester
ShearJet HL60 V2
products.description: Electric-hydraulic driven lab homogenizer for 3–500 mL samples with 5,000–30,000 psi operating pressure and ~68 mL/min flow. Designed for R&D, featuring compact design, HMI for control and data logging, and robust continuous operation.
features: Sample sizes from ~3 mL to 500 mL
Pressure range 5,000–30,000 psi (≈ 345–2,070 bar)
1 mL stroke, ~68 mL/min flow rate
Diamond Reaction Chamber® for high durability
Optional chiller-ready heat exchanger for temperature control
Touch-screen HMI with pulse/cycle modes and data acquisition
Compact footprint and low noise operation

products.name: ShearJet PL300
products.description: Pneumatic-driven medium-volume processor suitable for non-pharma and pharma applications. Operates up to 23,000 psi with 6 mL stroke and 350–450 mL/min throughput, supporting emulsions, dispersions, and nano-formulations.
features: Typical sample range: 50 mL – 2 L (non-pharma) or ≥ 70 mL (pharma)
Operating pressure up to 23,000 psi (≈ 1,586 bar)
6 mL stroke; 350–450 mL/min flow rate
Diamond Reaction Chamber® and adjustable back-pressure module
400 mL jacketed reservoir with optional larger tanks
Ceramic plunger and dual-gauge system
PH model features full pharma-grade contact parts

products.name: ShearJet HP1200 V2
products.description: Pilot-scale ShearJet HP1200 V2 series designed for process scale-up and high-throughput homogenization. Utilizes ShearJet Reaction Chamber technology with integrated heat-exchange options for temperature-sensitive formulations.
features: Pilot-scale throughput with scalable geometry
High-pressure homogenization using Reaction Chamber® design
Supports seamless scale-up from R&D to production
Integrated temperature-control and heat-exchange modules
Compatible with both standard and sanitary configurations
